mapper.select: SELECT cbp.id, cbp.block_id, tpi.title, cbp.problem_order, cbp.problem_id, cbp.score, cbp.reward_acb FROM t_challenge_block_problem cbp LEFT JOIN t_problem_info tpi on cbp.problem_id = tpi.problem_id WHERE cbp.block_id = #{blockId} ORDER BY cbp.problem_order ASC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT block_id from t_challenge_block_problem WHERE problem_id = #{problemId}
SELECT SUM(score) AS totalScore FROM t_challenge_block_problem cbp RIGHT JOIN t_challenge_block cb ON cb.id = cbp.block_id WHERE cb.id = #{blockId} GROUP BY cb.id
